item.title: 美国1月集装箱进口量下降6.8%，但笛卡尔公司表示，这一结果表明贸易正趋于正常化。
item.description: U.S. seaports in January handled 6.8% less container import volume than the year-ago month, when U.S. companies rushed in goods to front-run President Donald Trump's tariffs and sent imports soaring to a record high for the month, supply chain technology provider Descartes Systems Group said on Monday.

item.title: 印度古吉拉特邦与马斯克的星链公司签署协议
item.description: 印度古吉拉特邦周一宣布，已与埃隆·马斯克的星链公司签署意向书，将在该邦西部偏远及服务不足地区提供基于卫星的高速互联网接入服务。【原文：India's Gujarat state said on Monday that it had signed a letter of intent with Elon Musk's Starlink to provide high-speed, satellite-based internet connectivity across remote and underserved regions of the western state.】

item.title: Meta批评欧盟针对WhatsApp封杀人工智能竞争对手的反垄断举措
item.description: Meta Platforms周一抨击欧盟监管机构，此前欧盟指控这家美国科技巨头违反反垄断法规，并威胁要解除其在即时通讯服务WhatsApp上对人工智能竞争对手的封锁。【原文：Meta Platforms on Monday criticised EU regulators after they charged the U.S. tech giant with breaching antitrust rules and threaten to halt its block on AI rivals on its messaging service WhatsApp.】

item.title: 高盛称，随着并购交易复苏，2026年美国IPO募资额将激增至创纪录的1600亿美元，增幅达四倍。
item.description: 高盛分析师表示，美国股市将在2026年迎来首次公开募股（IPO）的强劲反弹，预计募资规模将翻四倍至创纪录的1600亿美元，因为SpaceX、OpenAI和Anthropic等知名企业正逐步接近公开上市。【原文：U.S. equity markets are set for a sharp rebound in IPOs in 2026, Goldman Sachs analysts said, forecasting proceeds quadrupling to a record $160 billion as marquee names such as SpaceX, OpenAI and Anthropic edge closer to public listings.】

item.title: 欧盟威胁对Meta采取临时措施，因其封锁WhatsApp上的AI竞争对手
item.description: 欧盟竞争监管机构周一指控Meta Platforms违反反垄断法规，通过封锁其即时通讯服务WhatsApp中的人工智能竞争对手，并威胁将对这家美国科技巨头采取临时措施。【原文：EU competition regulators on Monday charged Meta Platforms with breaching antitrust rules by blocking artificial intelligence rivals from its messaging service WhatsApp and threatened to impose interim measures against the U.S. tech giant.】

item.title: 渣打银行任命前瑞银银行家拉扎·贾弗里为全球私人客户销售主管
item.description: 渣打银行周一宣布任命拉扎·贾弗里为全球私人客户销售主管，该行正推动企业与投资银行部门与财富管理业务部门建立新合作关系，以服务单一家族办公室及超高净值客户。【原文：Standard Chartered said on Monday it had appointed Raza Jafree as global head of private client sales, as it sets up a new partnership between its corporate and investment bank and wealth unit to serve single-family offices and ultra-high net worth clients.】

item.title: 道达尔能源将为谷歌得克萨斯州数据中心提供太阳能电力
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司周一签署两项长期协议，将为谷歌位于得克萨斯州的数据中心供应太阳能电力，此举旨在满足人工智能驱动的电力需求增长。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies on Monday signed two long-term deals to supply solar power to Google’s data centres in Texas, as it looks to tap rising electricity demand driven by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价上涨，因Hims放弃售价49美元的减肥药
item.description: 诺和诺德在法兰克福上市的股票周一上涨4.5%，此前远程医疗公司Hims & Hers在周末撤回了其49美元复合减肥药的上市计划，该计划因诺和诺德和美国食品药品监督管理局的法律威胁而受阻。【原文：Novo Nordisk's Frankfurt-listed shares rose 4.5% on Monday after telehealth firm Hims & Hers reversed its launch of a $49 compounded weight-loss pill over the weekend, following legal threats from Novo and the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴超负荷运转的AI聊天机器人暂停发放优惠券，请求消费者耐心等待
item.description: 阿里巴巴旗下人工智能聊天机器人Qwen因用户量过载，已暂停发放优惠券服务，这阻碍了其推广新功能的计划——该功能旨在突破单纯答疑的局限，进一步提升购物辅助能力。【原文：Alibaba's artificial intelligence chatbot Qwen has temporarily stopped issuing coupons due to customer overload, hampering a new campaign to promote the tool's capabilities beyond simply answering questions to assist shopping.】

item.title: 中国吸尘器制造商Dreame通过超级碗广告宣传其计划中的电动汽车
item.description: 中国机器人吸尘器制造商 Dreame Technology 雄心勃勃地计划打造电动超跑，其在超级碗期间投放的30秒广告展示了即将推出的电动豪华轿车。【原文：Dreame Technology, a Chinese maker of robot vacuum cleaners with an audacious goal to build electric supercars, ran a 30-second Super Bowl commercial showcasing its planned electric luxury car.】

item.title: 中国机器人制造商蓄势待发，准备在春节娱乐活动中大放异彩
item.description: 在中国，人形机器人正作为春节娱乐项目亮相，其制造商向公众、潜在客户、投资者及政府官员展示了它们的歌舞才艺。【原文：In China, humanoid robots are serving as Lunar New Year entertainment, with their manufacturers pitching their song-and-dance skills to the general public as well as potential customers, investors and government officials.】

item.title: 裕信银行上调盈利预期，因收购竞争对手股权及税收抵免助力2025年收入增长
item.description: 意大利第二大银行裕信银行表示，今年目标将利润提升至110亿欧元（约合130亿美元）。此前该行2025年盈利已超出分析师预期，这得益于首席执行官安德烈亚·奥尔塞尔扩张战略下收购竞争对手股权带来的收益增长。【原文：Italy's second-largest bank UniCredit said it aimed to lift its profit to 11 billion euros ($13 billion) this year, after topping analysts' forecasts for 2025 with earnings boosted by stakes in rivals bought under CEO Andrea Orcel's expansion strategy.】

item.title: Advent与联邦快递牵头的财团以92亿美元收购包裹柜公司InPost
item.description: 由控股公司Advent和联邦快递牵头的财团已同意以每股15.60欧元的价格收购InPost，该包裹柜公司估值达78亿欧元（约合92亿美元）。相关企业周一宣布，此举旨在进一步扩大其在欧洲的业务覆盖范围。【原文：A consortium led by holding firm Advent and FedEx has agreed to buy InPost for 15.60 euros per share, valuing the parcel locker company at 7.8 billion euros ($9.2 billion) and aiming to further expand its reach across Europe, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 韩国监管机构称400亿美元赠款事件表明需制定新规应对加密货币风险
item.description: 韩国金融市场监管机构负责人周一表示，当地交易所Bithumb无意中向客户赠送价值逾400亿美元的比特币，这凸显出亟需完善监管以应对加密货币的脆弱性。【原文：The chief of South Korea's financial market watchdog said on Monday local exchange Bithumb's unintentional giveaway of more than $40 billion worth of bitcoins to customers raises the need for improved regulations to address the vulnerabilities of cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 新加坡称网络间谍组织瞄准电信基础设施
item.description: 新加坡网络安全局周一表示，该国四家电信公司——新电通、星和、M1和Simba电信——去年遭到网络间谍组织UNC3886的攻击。【原文：Singapore's four telecom companies, Singtel , StarHub , M1 and Simba Telecom , were targeted by cyber espionage group UNC3886 in attacks last year, Singapore's Cyber Security Agency said on Monday.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：日本市场欢迎首相长期留任的可能性
item.description: 韦恩·科尔为您解析欧洲及全球市场今日展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 必和必拓高管称，旗下Vicuña项目或将投资额翻倍，2026年阿根廷铜矿项目投资达8亿美元
item.description: 在安第斯山脉海拔4200多米的高处，阿根廷与智利边境线上，矿业公司Vicuña Corp.的一位高管表示，该公司计划在今年将投资额翻倍，押注全球最大的铜矿项目之一。【原文：High in the Andes Mountains, more than 4,200 meters above sea level on the Argentina–Chile border, mining company Vicuña Corp. aims to double its investment this year in one of the world’s biggest copper bets, a company executive said.】

item.title: 日本表示企业可拒绝非邀约收购要约以应对收购风险担忧
item.description: 日本产业省官员向路透社表示，日本企业即使收到大幅溢价收购要约，也无义务接受未经请求的收购要约。此番表态正值市场日益担忧激进投资者和外国收购方瞄准日本龙头企业之际。【原文：Japanese companies are not obliged to accept unsolicited takeover bids even when offered large premiums, an industry ministry official told Reuters, amid growing concern about the targeting of leading firms by activist investors and foreign acquirers.】

item.title: 台湾称40%芯片产能转移至美国"不可能"
item.description: 台湾首席关税谈判代表表示，将台湾40%的半导体产能转移至美国"不可能实现"，此言是对近期美国官员呼吁大规模转移生产所作回应。【原文：It would be "impossible" to move 40% of Taiwan's semiconductor capacity to the U.S., the island's top tariff negotiator said, pushing back against recent comments by American officials who called for a major production shift.】

item.title: 澳大利亚人工智能基础设施开发商Firmus从黑石集团和Coatue获得100亿美元债务融资方案
item.description: 澳大利亚人工智能公司Firmus周一宣布，已完成由全球私募股权公司黑石集团和纽约科技投资机构Coatue Management牵头的100亿美元债务融资方案。【原文：Australian artificial intelligence company Firmus said on Monday it had finalised a $10 billion debt funding package led by global private equity firm Blackstone and Coatue Management, a New York-based technology investor.】

item.title: 据Semafor报道，Live Nation高管正与美国司法部进行谈判以避免诉讼。
item.description: 据Semafor周日报道，Live Nation公司高管及游说人士正与美国司法部高级官员进行磋商，试图避免因涉嫌非法垄断经营而面临法庭审判。【原文：Live Nation executives and lobbyists are in talks with senior officials at the U.S. Department of Justice in a bid to avoid a trial over allegations that the company operates an illegal monopoly, news outlet Semafor reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 全球最大内存互连芯片供应商蒙特奇即将登陆香港市场
item.description: 中国蒙太奇科技公司股票将于周一在香港首次公开发行，开盘价预计将上涨57.2%。这家全球最大的内存互连芯片供应商通过此次股票发行筹集了70.4亿港元（约合9亿美元）。【原文：Shares of China's Montage Technology are set to open 57.2% higher on its Hong Kong trading debut on Monday, after the world's biggest memory interconnect chip supplier raised HK$7.04 billion ($900 million) in a share sale.】

item.title: 亚洲股市反弹，日本股价飙升至历史新高
item.description: 亚洲股市周一大幅跳涨，日本首相高市早苗的压倒性胜利激发了市场对更多再通胀政策的期待，而华尔街在最后关头实现反弹也令投资者普遍松了一口气。【原文：Asian markets leapt higher on Monday as a resounding win for Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi whetted appetites for more reflationary policies, while there was widespread investor relief at Wall Street's last gasp rebound.】

item.title: 日元贬值加剧，高市早苗胜选为日本刺激政策铺路
item.description: 周一亚洲早盘交易时段，日元延续近期跌势。此前日本首相高市早苗在周日选举中轻松获胜，为进一步实施财政刺激措施扫清了障碍。【原文：The yen extended a string of recent losses in early Asian trading on Monday after Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi swept to victory in Sunday's election, easing the path to further fiscal stimulus.】

item.title: 日本市场为首相高市早苗的历史性选举胜利做好准备
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗领导的执政联盟于周日赢得历史性选举胜利，这为她兑现减税承诺、通过财政支出刺激经济提供了政治授权。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's coalition swept to a historic election win on Sunday, handing her a mandate to follow through on a pledge to cut taxes and reflate the economy through spending.】

item.title: 马斯克称SpaceX将优先在月球建造自生长城市
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克周日表示，SpaceX公司已将重心转向在月球上建造一座"自我增长的城市"，他称该目标可在十年内实现。【原文：Elon Musk said on Sunday that SpaceX has shifted its focus to building a "self‑growing city" on the moon, which he said could be achieved in less than 10 years.】

item.title: 油价下跌逾1%，因对美伊可能爆发冲突的担忧缓解
item.description: 周一开盘时，油价下跌逾1%，因美国与伊朗上周五完成一轮会谈后，市场对两国在中东可能爆发冲突的担忧有所缓解。【原文：Oil prices dropped more than 1% at Monday's open as concerns about a possible conflict in the Middle East between the U.S. and Iran eased after both countries finished a round of talks on Friday.】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行第四季度净利润下滑10%，低于预期
item.description: 新加坡最大银行星展集团周一公布的第四季度净利润同比下降10%，主要原因是净息差收窄。【原文：DBS Group , Singapore's biggest bank, posted fourth-quarter net profit on Monday that was down 10% over the same period a year earlier, mainly due to lower net interest margin.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，克罗格公司计划任命前沃尔玛高管格雷格·福兰为下一任首席执行官。
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士报道，食品杂货巨头克罗格计划聘请前沃尔玛高管格雷格·福兰担任其下一任首席执行官。【原文：Grocery giant Kroger plans to hire Greg Foran, a former Walmart executive, as its next chief executive officer, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家：安哥拉寻求收购戴比尔斯20%-30%股权，高级官员透露
item.description: 安哥拉矿业部一名高级官员周日向路透社透露，该国正寻求收购英美资源集团旗下钻石业务戴比尔斯20%-30%的股权，目前正与其他非洲钻石生产国就此提案进行磋商。【原文：Angola is pursuing a 20%-30% stake in Anglo American's diamond unit De Beers, a proposal being discussed with other diamond-producing African nations, a senior official from Angola's mining ministry told Reuters on Sunday.】
